name: Hooked (ChPeStudio)
description:
Hooked is a short arcade-style fishing game that was made for the Seattle Indies 2018 game jam in ~2 days. The game jam had the theme of "Unexpected Results". As such the game evolves in unexpected ways over the course of it's short runtime (~3-10 minutes).

Controls
  • A/D - Move Left/Right
  • Space - Deploy hook.
  • Escape - Exit.
